SELECT CONCAT(th.building,'-',th.unit,'-',th.floor,'-',th.door) as housing, thm.name as tenementName,thm.mobile as mobile,thm.id_card as idCard, tu.real_name as ownerName,tu.id_card as ownerIdCard,tu.mobile as ownerMobile, thm.lease_over_time as leaseOverTime,thm.lease_start_time as leaseStartTime, th.unit as unit,th.floor as floor,th.house_type as houseType,thm.create_time as createTime FROM t_house_tenement thm join t_user tu on tu.uid=thm.householder_id join t_house th on thm.house_id=th.id
limit #{page},#{size}
SELECT count(*) FROM t_house_member thm join t_user tu on tu.uid=thm.householder_id join t_house th on thm.house_id=th.id
select distinct t.id as id,t.number as name from t_house t where t.community_id=#{query.communityId} and t.number like concat("%",#{query.name},"%") limit #{page},#{size}
select distinct t.id as id,t.building as name from t_house t where t.community_id=#{query.communityId} and t.building like concat("%",#{query.name},"%") limit #{page},#{size}
select distinct t.id as id,t.unit as name from t_house t where t.community_id=#{query.communityId} and t.unit like concat("%",#{query.name},"%") limit #{page},#{size}
